## LayoutResolver interface

Callback that finds the layout assigned to the object in the current rendering context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LayoutResolver 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [resolveLayout](./component-api.layoutresolver.resolvelayout.md) | <code>(aLayoutMode: string, aRenderingContext: RenderingContextV2) =&gt; Observable&lt;Layout&gt;</code> | Returns the layout layout object based on the rendering context and the mode |
